item.title: snRNA-seq atlas of pheochromocytoma and paraganglioma
item.description: Pheochromocytomas and paragangliomas (PCPG) are rare neuroendocrine tumors with high heritability and genetic diversity. This study comprised a comprehensive single nuclei RNA-seq analysis of 30 PCPG and two adult adrenal medulla tissues. Additionally, a large compendium of bulk gene expression data (Microarray and RNA-seq) was integrated to enable discovery and characterisation of novel subtypes and validation of the single nuclei data.
